title: Mismanaging Risk and the Vaccine Re-Review
sub_head: A global pandemic emergency is the worst possible time to appoint a department of second-guessing.
body:
Scott Gottlieb is right: “Drug Safety Is FDA’s Job, Not CDC’s” (op-ed, April 19). The Food and Drug Administration is a vast bureaucracy with more than a century of experience in evaluating medical innovation. A global pandemic emergency is the worst possible time to appoint a department of second-guessing to also review an urgently needed vaccine.
Richard E. Ralston
Americans for Free Choice in Medicine
Newport Beach, Calif.
